title: Alzex Personal Finances Pro v5.7.0.5056 Incl Patch-MPT [TorDigge
description:
Personal Finances Pro

Personal Finances - easy to use, simple visual application for tracking personal finansov.Otlichitelnymi feature is the beautiful and convenient user interface, ease of use and clarity of results. It will help you control your finances - understand where your money is going to allocate too "swollen" expenditure and cut down unnecessary expenses. 

Personal Finances can be installed on any USB drive and always have on hand. You can use the software on any computer (even if software installation is prohibited by administrator), anywhere - at home, at work, on travel. All data remains on a flash drive, the program leaves no traces on your computer. 

Key features:

- Ample opportunities for the organization of transactions: Categories, family members, contractors and labels. Grouping, sorting and filtering. Category system with unlimited nesting tree. The set of labels for each transaction. 
- Unlimited number of accounts and currencies. Grouping of accounts, hidden accounts. Loading courses via the Internet. 
- Consideration of current and planned expenses (scheduler). 
- Entering duplicate data at the touch of a button. 
- Ability to install the software on an external USB drive (flash drive). 
- Members, password protection and restriction of access rights. 
- Sync, import and export data. 
- Ability to work with a single database with multiple computers at the same time (on the network). 
- Consideration of debts and credits. 
- Monitoring the financial goals and control costs using budget. 
- Organization of transactions in calendar days. 
- Events and tasks. 
- Graphical reports and printing. 

What's new in v5.7:

Group by description added in reports. 
New charts: stacked and stacked percentage bar and area. 
Two more graphs: quantity and price. 

System Requirements:

Windows 7/Vista/XP X86 (32 bit) and X64 (64 bit) 

Homepage: http://www.financessoftware.com/

Installation Instructions: 

- Install program.
- Copy "Patch-MPT.exe" from patch folder and paste into default installation directory, Run Patch As Administrator Finally choose "PersonalFinances.exe" and apply patch.
- Done, Enjoy.

Have A Nice Day

Note: Uploader is only responsible if any problem in torrent, never responsible for software functionality problems.
